meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Stephanie Bethel Jon Golbe Matt DeTura Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6002.

td.p: Stephanie Bethel, a public information officer from Las Vegas, Nevada
Jon Golbe, an actor and TV writer from Brooklyn, New York
Matt DeTura, a recent law school graduate from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,200)

tr.td: WHISTLER
A HAPPY TUNE
FIREFIGHTING
CLASSIC TOYS
(Alex: Not "This is".)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'James Whistler\'s "Arrangement in Black & Gray No. 1", a portrait of her, was initially rejected by the Royal Academy')

tr.td: James Whistler's "Arrangement in Black & Gray No. 1", a portrait of her, was initially rejected by the Royal Academy

Jon
Stephanie

SCIENCE IS GOLDEN
A PLACE TO CALL HOME

div.onmouseover:

(Stephanie: What is two?)
...

four

Stephanie
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_3', 'clue_DJ_1_3_stuck', '(Jon: What is fight, fight?)
(Alex: No, same idea, but...)
(Jon: Struggle?)
(Alex: No.)
(Jon: Something else.)
(Alex: Something else. [*]...)
(Jon: [*]!)
(Alex: ...[*], against the dying of the light.)
(Jon: That hurts!)
(Alex: I know it does.)

rage

Jon
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_1_3', 'clue_DJ_1_3_stuck', 'Dylan Thomas instructed, "Do not go gentle into that good night" but do this, this "against the dying of the light"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Matt
Jon
Stephanie
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: You have to figure it was in anticipation of a visit by the Pope, but who was Pope in 1997? That\'s basically what we\'re asking.)
StephanieWho is Pope John Paul II
$3,500
JonWho is Pope John Paul II
$2,000
MattWho is Pope John Paul II?
$5,000
Pope John Paul II')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Cuba removed Christmas from its list of national holidays in 1969 & restored it in 1997 in anticipation of a visit by this man')

tr.td: HOLIDAY HISTORY
Cuba removed Christmas from its list of national holidays in 1969 & restored it in 1997 in anticipation of a visit by this man
Matt
Jon
Stephanie
2-day champion: $45,200
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Matt
Jon
Stephanie

23 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

10 R,
3 W
(including 1 DD)

11 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)
